Page.Table:
PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter Starting Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField01 6 8 R Enter a valid starting date
Enter Ending Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField02 6 8 R Enter a valid ending date
Enter Repair Type (M),(O),(R),(U),(A)ll DropDown PPDField03 1 1 R (M)aintenance, (O)verhaul, (R)epairs, (U)sage, or (A)ll H M,O,R,U,A M,O,R,U,A
Enter Repair Source (FA),(AP),(JC),(A)ll DropDown PPDField04 1 2 R Fixed Assets, Accounts Payable, Job Costing, or (A)ll H FA,AP,JC,A FA,AP,JC,A
Enter Option (N),(P),(U),(R),(E),(A)ll DropDown PPDField05 1 1 R (N)ew,(P)rinted,(U)pdated,(R)ejected,(E)ntered (N,P,R),(A)ll H N,P,U,R,E,A N,P,U,R,E,A
Enter Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField06 1 3 R Enter a valid division # or (ALL)
